alert.note: Alert for Logan; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 4:33PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Oklahoma, northwestern Lincoln and southeastern Logan Counties through 515 PM CST... At 433 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Luther, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Edmond, Luther, Carney, Tryon and Fallis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
